posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I've been needing to get back to hitting things hard after recent excursions into variations of subtlety. Nothing fancy, just a strong melee presence who cheers herself up with a little song while she chops things in half.

It's a combo I've seen before, but always much heavier on Bard, and I also like the thought of a slender, graceful elf unleashing some inner demons on an unsuspecting world. It also means I get free longsword proficiency from the start, so don't need to worry about a WF before going to CoT. One very viable tweak would be to drop Toughness, jiggle a few feats around, and take another WF in a 2-hander as well, for added oomph (which I know Valerfor would approve of). Yes, I know I could have both with a human build, but where's the fun in that? I also decided to grab all 7 Great Strengths just for kicks, so saved some CoT bonus feats so I could take 5 in epic levels - I still think it works though, if not entirely optimized.

Your thoughts are, as ever, appreciated.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
That means a lot to me, thanks, Valerfor!

Btw, should anyone wish to go for the 2-handed WF option, take it at level 12, shifting IKD to 18 to replace Toughness. Also, obvs, make your crits and EWF in the 2-hander. You'll lose 3 AC from the loss of tower shield, but you've always got the option to grab that longsword again to go S+B. You'll also lose 40 HPs, but that shouldn't really matter. You'll be gaining 1.5 damage, so enemies shouldn't last long enough to let get you that low.

Interestingly enough, looking at Blanche's current classes, she started as a Barbarian/ Ranger/ HS. I just couldn't make it work properly. She'd have made a decent tank, but not a front-line hitter.

Cheers

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Thank you very much, Mick.

I almost called this one "Going Back to My Roots," because much as I've been enjoying discovering other builds and classes (and hopefully will continue to do so), I needed to go home for a bit.

That said, Blanche was partly down to you. It was mulling over your Ranger/ WM/ SD thread that started it. Then you'd mentioned something about Bard/ AA/ Barbarian in a thread that I started. That started my thinking about a Barb and Ranger mix-up with a Tumble class thrown in. From there I went to Barb/ Bard/ RDD, but there are thousands of them out there. Then someone asked about Panthro (Valerfor's Half-Orc Bard/ Fighter/ RDD). Then I remembered my first ever build request, for which Empyre provided an elf Bard/ Fighter/ RDD, with tweaks from Valerfor. And finally I thought I'd try something myself.

Weird how the brain works, ain't it?

Cheers
